title: Rural Japan Hideaway in Western Honshu with Onsite Restaurant & Onsen Spa
description:
Discover total serenity at Mercure Toyama Tonami Resort & Spa, where ancient Japanese hot springs meet stunning natural beauty. Set against a backdrop of majestic mountains and flowering gardens, this sanctuary offers private onsens and seasonal gourmet dining, located near Tonami Tulip Park, one of Japan's most spectacular green spaces.

Every elegantly designed room features minimalist Japanese aesthetics with European-style conveniences, creating spaces that soothe both body and mind. The resort's crowning jewel is the onsen spa fed by natural hot springs. Onsite Locavore restaurant crafts local dishes using fresh ingredients from Toyama's mountains and the Sea of Japan.
offer_address: 330 Tenno, Yasukawa, Tonami Toyama, Toyama 939-1438, Japan
